short_description: fastpath function to generate required bins and binning parameters to be used by TD_BincodeTransform for converting the numeric data into categorical data. Supports two methods {EQUAL-WIDTH, VARIABLE-WIDTH}
long_description: fastpath function to generate required bins and binning parameters to be used by TD_BincodeTransform for converting the numeric data into categorical data. Supports two methods {EQUAL-WIDTH, VARIABLE-WIDTH}

input_tables.name: InputTable
input_tables.rDescription: The relation that contains input data.
input_tables.description: The relation that contains input data.

input_tables.name: FitInput
input_tables.rDescription: The FitInputTable containing binning parameters for Variable-Width, not needed for EQUAL-WIDTH.
input_tables.description: The FitInputTable containing binning parameters for Variable-Width, not needed for EQUAL-WIDTH.

output_tables.name: OutputTable
output_tables.rDescription: Name for the table that the function will generate when MethodType is EQUAL-WIDTH.
output_tables.description: Name for the table that the function will generate when MethodType is EQUAL-WIDTH.

argument_clauses.name: TargetColumns
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the input table columns for which bins information and binning parameters needs to be generated.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the input table columns for which bins information and binning parameters needs to be generated.

argument_clauses.name: MethodType
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the MethodType which will be used for histogram computation. Supported MethodType are {EQUAL-WIDTH, VARIABLE-WIDTH}.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the MethodType which will be used for histogram computation. Supported MethodType are {EQUAL-WIDTH, VARIABLE-WIDTH}.

argument_clauses.name: NBins
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the number of bins to be used when MethodType is EQUAL-WIDTH, not needed for VARIABLE-WIDTH. If one value is provided, it applies to all target columns, if more than one value is specified, NBins values applies to TargetColumns in the order specified by the user.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the number of bins to be used when MethodType is EQUAL-WIDTH, not needed for VARIABLE-WIDTH. If one value is provided, it applies to all target columns, if more than one value is specified, NBins values applies to TargetColumns in the order specified by the user.

argument_clauses.name: LabelPrefix
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the labelprefix to be used when MethodType is EQUAL-WIDTH. If one value is provided, it applies to all target columns. If more than one value is specified, Labelprefix values applies to TargetColumns in the order specified by the user. Default values are target column names.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the labelprefix to be used when MethodType is EQUAL-WIDTH. If one value is provided, it applies to all target columns. If more than one value is specified, Labelprefix values applies to TargetColumns in the order specified by the user. Default values are target column names.

argument_clauses.name: TargetColNames
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the FitInputTable column which contains column Name for which bins are specified. Default value is ColumnName.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the FitInputTable column which contains column Name for which bins are specified. Default value is ColumnName.

argument_clauses.name: MinValueColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the FitInputTable column which contains Min Value for the specified bins. Default value is MinValue.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the FitInputTable column which contains Min Value for the specified bins. Default value is MinValue.

argument_clauses.name: MaxValueColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the FitInputTable column which contains Max Value for the specified bins. Default value is MaxValue.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the FitInputTable column which contains Max Value for the specified bins. Default value is MaxValue.

argument_clauses.name: LabelColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the FitInputTable column which contains label for which bins are specified. Default value is Label.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the FitInputTable column which contains label for which bins are specified. Default value is Label.
